item.description:
Provided its not raining....
This is a location that has a few interesting pond and river areas.
I am doing this kayak event because i am doing the Gay city hike later in the day and this location is pretty close to the hike and is on the return trip route.

Getting there:
From Hartford: take I 84 east to exit 59 onto I 384 east.... When I 384 ends at rte 6 and 44..take the left split = rte 44 east.... for 7.8 miles and turn right onto rte 275 (South Eagleville Road) at the boat launch sign...
The access is on the right in apx .3 miles just after the dam/bridge on the right at the beginning of Pine Lake Drive...

The hike is at 3 so load up around 2 or so...eat lunch or whatever...

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Recreational Kayak Event, Eaglevill Pond and river..up from the dam
